summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Italy Disaster Risk Management Platform (RE-ACT Mediterranean design). Backend API testing achieved 100% success rate with all endpoints functioning correctly. Frontend UI testing confirmed complete compliance with design requirements including 3-column bento layouts, dark navy theme, Orbitron fonts, colored section bars, and proper integration across all monitor pages.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads with proper 3-column layout (Recent Seismic Activity, Italy Risk Map, Active Alerts)
Navigation bar shows RE-ACT Mediterranean logo with cyan ring design
All stat cards display with correct colors (green=seismic, blue=flood, orange=heat, teal=hospital)
Seismic Monitor page loads with events, epicenter map, and 24-48H predictions panel
Flood Risk page loads with flood areas, coastal risk map, and flood predictions
Heat Wave page loads with heat alerts, heat map, and heat predictions
Hospital Finder loads with search functionality, hospital list with progress bars, map, and privacy notice
Dark navy theme (#0C1A2E) properly implemented across all pages
Orbitron font correctly used for headers and titles
Colored section bars present on all monitor pages with correct colors
Risk badges properly styled and functional
Interactive maps working with appropriate markers and popups
Backend API endpoint /api/dashboard/summary returns correct data (100% success)
Backend API endpoint /api/seismic/events returns earthquake data (100% success)
Backend API endpoint /api/flood/alerts returns flood data (100% success)
Backend API endpoint /api/heatwave/alerts returns heat data (100% success)
Backend API endpoint /api/hospitals returns hospital data (100% success)
Search and filter functionality working in Hospital Locator
Progress bars showing bed availability in hospital list
Privacy notice properly displayed in Hospital Finder
Navigation between all pages working correctly
Real-time data integration with all monitoring systems
Responsive 3-column bento grid layouts
Large colored numbers in stat cards with proper color coding
